text: Mitzpe, a Hebrew word meaning lookout, may refer to the following places in Israel: *Mitzpe Aviv *Mitzpe Dani *Mitzpe Dona Gracia *Mitzpe Eshtemoa *Mitzpe Hagit *Mitzpe Hila *Mitzpe Ilan *Mitzpe Kramim *Mitzpe Netofa *Mitzpe Ramon *Mitzpe Shalem *Mitzpe Yair *Mitzpe Yeriho *Mitzpe Yosef
title: Mitzpe
